fig.alt-text: Five maps indicating recent climate (1981–2010), short-term projected climate (2011–2040) for RCP4.5 and RCP8.5, and long-term projected climate (2041–2070) for RCP4.5 and RCP8.5. The number of months where R subscript 0 is greater than 1.0 are 0, 1 (July), 2 (July and August), and 3 (June, July, and August).
